entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
